object.name: ChatMemberRestricted
object.description: Represents a chat member that is under certain restrictions in the chat. Supergroups only.
object.html_description: Represents a chat member that is under certain restrictions in the chat. Supergroups only.
object.rst_description: Represents a `chat member <https://core.telegram.org/bots/api#chatmember>`_ that is under certain restrictions in the chat. Supergroups only.

annotations.description: The member's status in the chat, always 'restricted'
annotations.html_description: The member's status in the chat, always “restricted”
annotations.rst_description: The member's status in the chat, always 'restricted'
annotations.name: status

annotations.description: True, if the user is a member of the chat at the moment of the request
annotations.html_description: True, if the user is a member of the chat at the moment of the request
annotations.rst_description: :code:`True`, if the user is a member of the chat at the moment of the request
annotations.name: is_member

annotations.description: True, if the user is allowed to change the chat title, photo and other settings
annotations.html_description: True, if the user is allowed to change the chat title, photo and other settings
annotations.rst_description: :code:`True`, if the user is allowed to change the chat title, photo and other settings
annotations.name: can_change_info

annotations.description: True, if the user is allowed to invite new users to the chat
annotations.html_description: True, if the user is allowed to invite new users to the chat
annotations.rst_description: :code:`True`, if the user is allowed to invite new users to the chat
annotations.name: can_invite_users

annotations.description: True, if the user is allowed to pin messages
annotations.html_description: True, if the user is allowed to pin messages
annotations.rst_description: :code:`True`, if the user is allowed to pin messages
annotations.name: can_pin_messages

annotations.description: True, if the user is allowed to create forum topics
annotations.html_description: True, if the user is allowed to create forum topics
annotations.rst_description: :code:`True`, if the user is allowed to create forum topics
annotations.name: can_manage_topics

annotations.description: True, if the user is allowed to send text messages, contacts, locations and venues
annotations.html_description: True, if the user is allowed to send text messages, contacts, locations and venues
annotations.rst_description: :code:`True`, if the user is allowed to send text messages, contacts, locations and venues
annotations.name: can_send_messages

annotations.description: True, if the user is allowed to send audios, documents, photos, videos, video notes and voice notes
annotations.html_description: True, if the user is allowed to send audios, documents, photos, videos, video notes and voice notes
annotations.rst_description: :code:`True`, if the user is allowed to send audios, documents, photos, videos, video notes and voice notes
annotations.name: can_send_media_messages

annotations.description: True, if the user is allowed to send polls
annotations.html_description: True, if the user is allowed to send polls
annotations.rst_description: :code:`True`, if the user is allowed to send polls
annotations.name: can_send_polls

annotations.description: True, if the user is allowed to send animations, games, stickers and use inline bots
annotations.html_description: True, if the user is allowed to send animations, games, stickers and use inline bots
annotations.rst_description: :code:`True`, if the user is allowed to send animations, games, stickers and use inline bots
annotations.name: can_send_other_messages

annotations.description: True, if the user is allowed to add web page previews to their messages
annotations.html_description: True, if the user is allowed to add web page previews to their messages
annotations.rst_description: :code:`True`, if the user is allowed to add web page previews to their messages
annotations.name: can_add_web_page_previews

annotations.description: Date when restrictions will be lifted for this user; unix time. If 0, then the user is restricted forever
annotations.html_description: Date when restrictions will be lifted for this user; unix time. If 0, then the user is restricted forever
annotations.rst_description: Date when restrictions will be lifted for this user; unix time. If 0, then the user is restricted forever
annotations.name: until_date
